---
name: Add Payments & Invoicing
about: Implement invoicing, partial/full payments, discounts, and reporting
---

### Summary

Implement invoicing (create/issue/reissue), record payments (partial/full), discounts, and invoice views. Add payment endpoints and simple CSV/export reporting.

### Acceptance Criteria

- Models/migrations for Invoices and Payments
- Endpoints to create invoices, record payments (partial/full), reissue invoices
- Support discounts and partial payments in invoice calculations
- Simple reporting/export (CSV) for payments and outstanding invoices

### Notes

Integrate with a mock payment provider or prepare hooks for external gateways.
